translations: 参加，参与；<古>分担，分享；<古>具有，带有（特殊的性质）

sentences.sentence: She didn't participate in the discussion.
They expected him to participate in the ceremony.
sentences.translation: 他们希望他参加这个典礼。

sentences.sentence: Over half the population of this country participate in sports.
sentences.translation: 这个国家一半以上的人参加体育运动。
